ai_decision.reasoning: Google Vision provides the highest confidence score (0.95) and a good preview of the text, indicating a higher likelihood of accurate extraction.  While the other providers also show promising results, Google Vision's text preview demonstrates better formatting and  preservation of crucial invoice details like line breaks, suggesting a more structured output.  Tesseract's result is slightly lower in confidence and has some formatting irregularities. Easy OCR, despite a decent preview, has a lower confidence score and potentially missing data given the shorter text length. Paddle OCR completely failed, returning no text.
